gist.headline: Gearing up
gist.blurb: Productivity Gears just landed in the showcase. A suite of 100 toolsâ€”enough to keep even the busiest drone happy.
gist.summary: Added Productivity Gears, a comprehensive suite of free utilities and AI assistants, to the community apps list.
gist.impact: Users can now discover a massive collection of converters, editors, and productivity tools in the Dev_Tools section.
gist.visual_concept: A cozy workshop scene. The metaphor is 'gears' and 'tools'. Polly the bee and the Robot are inspecting a new delivery of equipment.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot and the monitor robot in a warm workshop, sorting through a wooden crate filled with glowing lime green (#ecf874) gears and pixelated tools. Soft pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Nostalgic and industrious.
